headline: Is AMD’s Soaring AI Fueled Share Price Still Justified in 2025?
summary: If you are wondering whether Advanced Micro Devices at around $215 a share is still a smart buy or if the big gains are largely behind it, you are not alone. This is exactly the question we are going to unpack. The stock is up 8.5% over the last week and 78.3% year to date, building on a 70.3% gain over the past year and a 243.7% return over three years that has reset expectations and risk perceptions for investors. Recent headlines have focused on AMD expanding its presence in artificial...
